name: (C) BTO RDO Walls
_description: Targeted cost and performance of commercial walls n BTO R&D roadmap.

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Wall: assumes 2 inch insulation thickness and corresponding objective to develop thin, high-R insulation

source_data.title: Opaque Envelopes: Pathway to Building Energy Efficiency and Demand Flexibility RDO Report
source_data.author: U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, Building Technologies Office

installed_cost_source.notes: Based on 10 year payback for given performance levels. Add-on (incremental) cost.

source_data.title: Opaque Envelopes: Pathway to Building Energy Efficiency and Demand Flexibility RDO Report
source_data.author: U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, Building Technologies Office

product_lifetime_source.notes: Assumed equal to the lifetime of the building
